title: Bundle 32.4.16 — Re-show Hotkey Hint on History Header Hover
intent: When user hovers the History header or '1–5' hint chip, the keyboard hint overlay re-appears briefly using the existing scheduleHint() timer (6s auto-dismiss, non-modal).

what_changed: Added `hoverHint` event to HistoryStackPanel.vue emits definition
Added @mouseenter handlers to History title and '1–5' hint chip that emit('hoverHint')
Added showHintFromHover() helper in RosetteEditorView.vue that calls scheduleHint() if history exists
Wired @hoverHint event from HistoryStackPanel to showHintFromHover handler
No new state variables, timers, or UI elements—reuses existing hint overlay from Bundle 32.4.15
Hover triggers same 6-second auto-dismiss timer as initial hint display
diff_articulation.why_not_redundant: Before: Hint only showed once when history first became available (Bundle 32.4.15). After: Hint can be re-triggered by hovering History header or '1–5' chip. Implementation adds interactivity missing from previous bundles. Uses event emission pattern (hoverHint) not present in codebase before. Provides user-initiated hint recall without requiring full history actions.

commands_run: Full file scan: HistoryStackPanel.vue (269 lines) and RosetteEditorView.vue (716 lines) read completely
Coverage: 100% of files read before modification
